attributes.action: We the Public are extremly unhappy with the current style of Government and potential Government being expressed by the main political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are fed up with the constant shifting of ground and the blame culture that exists in Government. We wish the Government to stop saying 'Not me Gov!' to every crises that arises and take real responsibilty for their actions. We think that a person failing to vote or spoiling a paper should be counted as a vote of dissastisfation.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
